# EpiGraphDB

[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/epigraphdb)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=epigraphdb)
<!-- badges: end -->

# Installation

`devtools` is required to install from IEU gitlab

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_git(
  "git@ieugit-scmv-d0.epi.bris.ac.uk:epigraphdb/epigraphdb-r.git",
  git = "external"
)
```

# Example

```{r example}
library("epigraphdb")
mr(outcome = "Body mass index")
```
